name: The Kind-ers! from No Breakfast Club
name_original: The Kind-ers! from No Breakfast Club
description:
The Kind-ers was created by Abertay University's MA team No Breakfast Club for the UKIE Raise the Game Jam 2020.

Meet The Kind-ers! Pea, Wedge, Punch and Mallow, four chalk drawings come to life. They must each use their individual skills and shapes to find their way out of the level.

Credits

Producer: Jake de Búrca

Sound & Music: Ryan Boyack

Art: Kristina Cutajar, Courtney Spivey

Design: Sandy Steele, Courtney Spivey

Programming: Mauro Lana, Sandy Steele
